error_details.explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '/' instead.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 16
He finished high school in 4-1=<<4-1=4>>4 years
It takes him 3*4=<<3*4=12>>12 years to finish tertiary education
So he spends 4+12=<<4+12=16>>16 years on this education
